price: Musa akasema: Hayo yamekwisha kuwa baina yangu na wewe. Muda mmojapo nikiumaliza sitiwi ubayani. Na Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mlinzi juu ya haya tunayo yasema.
arabic: قَالَ ذَٰلِكَ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكَۖ أَيَّمَا ٱلۡأَجَلَيۡنِ قَضَيۡتُ فَلَا عُدۡوَٰنَ عَلَيَّۖ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَا نَقُولُ وَكِيلٞ
footnotes: Musa akasema: Hayo uliyo niahidi ni sawa sawa baina yangu na wewe. Muda wowote katika huo nitakao kufanyia kazi itakuwa nimekutimizia ahadi yako. Wala mimi sitaki zaidi kuliko hayo. Na Mwenyezi Mungu ni shahidi kwa tunayo yasema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla dhālika baynī wabaynaka ayyamā al-ajalayni qaḍaytu falā ʿud'wāna ʿalayya wal-lahu ʿalā mā naqūlu wakīlun
